mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.member_id, p.title, p.content, p.like_count, p.created, p.updated, p.deleted, m.name, m.email, count(c.id) as comment_count FROM post p inner join member m on p.member_id = m.id left join comment c on p.id = c.post_id group by p.id ORDER BY p.id DESC;

SELECT p.id, p.member_id, p.title, p.content, p.like_count, p.created, p.updated, p.deleted, m.name, m.email, count(c.id) as comment_count FROM post p inner join member m on p.member_id = m.id left join comment c on p.id = c.post_id WHERE p.id = #{id} group by p.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post(member_id, title, content, like_count, created) VALUES(#{memberId}, #{title}, #{content}, 0, now())
